author: Yael Bastian
text: Three days in a row. Paka agang meetings.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Another small win. Some of my efforts got recognized today as effective, if anything, ground-breaking. Taking my wins, big or small.

author: Yael Bastian
text: What a day.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Yes, a million times yes! #plantito https://t.co/XwUOf1osIC

author: Yael Bastian
text: Sometimes we all need a little reminder about why we are fighting and what we are fighting for. It was never about me and my struggles because God knows I can take a beating. It’s always been about going through life’s challenges for the people I value the most.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Having this really deep conversation with le mudra atm which I haven’t had in a long while. I’ve always been a momma’s boy.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Was told today that I have excellent eye for detail daw. In totality of the things I do, it’s not much but I am taking my wins, big or small.

author: Yael Bastian
text: If you watch the news, sit down and listen talaga, you can determine for yourself which candidates and dapat iboto. Makikita mo who has the solid platforms and who’s cruising on vague terminologies. Madaling madetermine yan kung may utak ka at nag-iisip ka.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Yung daily may triggers ka and constantly struggling how to overcome them. Why is life so complicated?

author: Yael Bastian
text: While I’d like to believe I know a lot, there’s much I do not know and much to unlearn and learn.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Mounted some shelves on the wall. Did the plumbing and replaced two faucets and it’s not even noon yet.

author: Yael Bastian
text: One of our cats broke our TV last night. Goodbye 43” Samsung 4K TV. It was a good six months. 😭😭😭 https://t.co/A8UjWrqUw3

author: Yael Bastian
text: Really need to get back on track with my home workout. Lately, it’s been tiring I always end up wanting to just sleep, eat, or watch Netflix. https://t.co/vyPLLpmoHu

author: Yael Bastian
text: Schitt’s  Creek for the right kind of laughs.

author: Yael Bastian
text: In my moments of weakness and difficulties with my struggles, Lord guide me.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Gloomy Monday mornings. https://t.co/8OnOBsf12J

author: Yael Bastian
text: Back aches.

author: Yael Bastian
text: So one of our cats got on top of the aquarium while we were sleeping and ate one of the fish from the tank.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Someone needs a haircut and some new set of eyebags. https://t.co/IKl9hvnU5W

author: Yael Bastian
text: Battlebots and cake on a Tuesday. https://t.co/BWHSVjIsdi

author: Yael Bastian
text: Someone needs a wardrobe upgrade and a change of color palette.

author: Yael Bastian
text: People drinking outside last night kept yapping at each other “BBM pa din”. But when they asked each other why him, there was a long pause then all together said “BBM pa din!” then they starter complaining about some guy they all know who stole 5K and a mobile phone. Yes? https://t.co/asJoe0Tvoi

author: Yael Bastian
text: Finally got the chance to lift some weights after a few weeks of stagnation. 😂😂😂 https://t.co/LKP5LoojXV

author: Yael Bastian
text: Leos aint no fools. We just play along for the fun of it. https://t.co/S2vzGu054N

author: Yael Bastian
text: Catching up to my God of War game sesh on PS4. Chill #gamingweekends https://t.co/s7C4rrPMgC

author: Yael Bastian
text: 99.95%. Accurately advertised. ASC approved claims with testimonials. 😝😝😝 https://t.co/n51DTpkdUb

author: Yael Bastian
text: I will always appreciate the silence of weekend mornings.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Whoever designed the new 5 peso coins is a terrible person.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Malakas tayong tao, sis. We can do this. Life has throw a ton of shit our way and we just flushed them down the toilet. Pak!

author: Yael Bastian
text: Waking up on a weekend morning to the view of the “bukirin” and fresh air is paradise. Well, the beach views are better but this will do until I hit the beach again. https://t.co/DCSZ21JKMY

author: Yael Bastian
text: Better narratives are coming.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Saw this really nice bag on Zalora. Add to cart na sana until I saw the 12K tag. Next?

author: Yael Bastian
text: Soya bean curd! Soya bean curd! Sheeeesh! https://t.co/ljY4PwS6h5

author: Yael Bastian
text: Thanks God for Netflix stand-ups. The world needs this.

author: Yael Bastian
text: So the nurse at the clinic asked me “37 ka na po talaga?” twice. How many times do I have to explain to people I am in my late 30’s na?

author: Yael Bastian
text: Hello, my beloved south! It’s been almost 2 years. North to south drive and back again. https://t.co/tSI6F0qBPh

author: Yael Bastian
text: It’s been how many years and you still do what you shouldn’t be doing. Walang character development?

author: Yael Bastian
text: Waking up to a new day with a new state of mind is refreshing.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Yung feeling na you projected worse-case scenarios then planned for every possible mishap and got so stressed in the process tas things went smoothly on the day? Heaven.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Managing three to four remote “teams” while onsite amidst the chaos and making sure every more if on-sync can be challenging, no?

author: Yael Bastian
text: On ground team. Live from the news room! 😂😆 https://t.co/2VDnsAbFrX

author: Yael Bastian
text: Final stretch.

author: Yael Bastian
text: What are deadlines for?

author: Yael Bastian
text: Writing and editing. Website updates. Briefing and reviewing creative mats. Database management. Ano pa? Kulang pa daw ang workload.

author: Yael Bastian
text: That first sip of coffee on an early working Monday morning after a long working Sunday night before. Heaven.

author: Yael Bastian
text: Meeting. Meeting. Meeting. Recording. Meeting. Meeting. Costing. Checking. Pak. Pak. Pak. Ganern. Ganern.
